All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
Company
Company class is an array-based container class that implements the employee database.
Date
Date: this class defines the properties of a Date object, specifically year, month, day.
Employee
Employee class defines the common data and operations for all employee types; each employee has a profile that uniquely identifies the employee.
Fulltime
Fulltime class extends the Employee class and includes specific data and operations to a full-time employee.
Management
Management class extends the Fulltime class and includes specific data and operations to a full-time employee with a management role.
Parttime
Parttime class extends the Employee class and includes the hourly rate and hours worked of a part-time employee, as well as relevant functions.
PayrollProcessing
The PayrollProcessing class acts as a user interface to interact with a particular instance of Company.
Profile
Profile class defines the name, department, and date hired to be used in the Employee class.
RunProject2
RunProject2: class to run Project2
